original_text: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord, and followed the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, which made Israel to sin; he departed not therefrom.
korean_text: 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하여 이스라엘에게 범죄하게 한 느밧의 아들 여로보암의 죄를 따라가고 거기서 떠나지 아니하였으므로

sentences.original_text: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여호와 보시기에 악한 일을 행하였고

sentences.original_text: and followed the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat
